pages.text: Now that you have some basic power generation you can build and power a large$(br)$(item)Industrial Squeezer$().$(br2)That can press seeds into plant oil, and press the $(item)Blood$() out of the $(item)Logs$() from the $(l:sim_2/resources/2_blessed_trees)Blessed Trees$() found around the $(item)Lunar Plane$().

pages.title: Squeezer Materials
pages.notes: $(item)Right click$() on the correct side with an $(item)Engineers Hammer$() to assemble once the structure is placed.$(br2)Don't forget to use $(l:portal_hub/4_schematica)Schematica$() if you're unsure of how to build the multiblock.

pages.title: Blood Coating
pages.description1: Drop 4x $(item)Pigiron Ingot$() into $(item)Blood$() to create 4x $(item)Sanguine Metal Ingot$().
pages.description2: Drop a $(item)Pigiron Block$() into $(item)Blood$() to create a $(item)Sanguine Metal Block$().

pages.title: Metal Press Mats
pages.notes: You could also use some of your early $(item)Power$() to set up a $(item)Metal Press$().$(br2)$(item)Right click$() on the piston with an $(item)Engineers Hammer$() to assemble once the structure is placed.$(br2)The $(item)Conveyor belts$() should face one direction and the $(item)Piston$() should be facing down.
